sentences.english: The cook served out tins of food to all the mountaineers.
sentences.chinese: 炊事员把罐头食品分给所有登山队员。

sentences.english: Freeze food and use a microwave to heat it, which uses less energy than cooking from scratch.
sentences.chinese: 冷冻食品和使用微波炉加热，使用不到从头炊事能源。

sentences.english: The cook had the water hot in a jiffy.
sentences.chinese: 炊事员马上就使水热了。

sentences.english: And he told me I could go to the canteen to get paste, he had arranged well with the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 临走时说，糨子到伙房去打，他已经跟炊事员说好了。

sentences.english: The application server is the cook.
sentences.chinese: 应用程序服务器是炊事员。

sentences.english: Requisitioned by the army during the Revolution, the buildings were used as a guard-room and a bakery.
sentences.chinese: 大革命时期农场被军队征用，用于警卫室和炊事房。

sentences.english: Every cooking unit is dismountable for maintenance and replacement.
sentences.chinese: 可分别对各个炊事单元进行拆卸或更换维护。

sentences.english: Has the field cook been added yet?
E. G. :In the beginning, Sanford Carter was ashamed of becoming an army cook.
sentences.chinese: 一开始，桑弗卡特觉得在部队里当炊事兵挺丢人的。
厨房预留炊事动力机械用电负荷100KW。

sentences.english: In addition to saving time, you save money and energy by spending cooking less.
sentences.chinese: 除了节省时间，你也会因减少炊事而节省金钱和能源。

sentences.english: We have a few kitchen things and a dining toom set.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一些炊事用具和一套餐室设备。

sentences.english: The cook went to see after the cake left in the oven.
sentences.chinese: 炊事员去照看炉子里的蛋糕了。

sentences.english: He was a cook before his demobilization.
sentences.chinese: 他复员以前是一名炊事员。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a multi-functional domestic flour-mixing machine which is an unprecedented domestic cooking machine.
sentences.chinese: 家用多功能和面机是一种空前的家用炊事机械。

sentences.english: The invention provides a dismountable pan handle, belonging to the technical field of cooking utensil.
sentences.chinese: 一种脱卸式的锅提手，属于炊事用具技术领域。

definition: large kitchen stove made from bricks or earth/(PRC) ordinary mess hall (lowest dining standard, ranked below 中灶[zhong1 zao4] for mid-level cadres and 小灶[xiao3 zao4] for the most privileged)
to make a fire/to light a fire
mess hall for mid-level cadres/cf. 大灶[da4 zao4]
to light a fire for cooking
stoker (worker operating a coal fire, esp. for a steam engine)
